settings.faq_accordion_header: How do I join Swoveralls Rewards?
settings.faq_accordion_content: Simply sign up to create your account and start earning rewards!
Earn credits by signing up, making purchases, and more! Check out all the ways to earn store credit.

settings.faq_accordion_header: How do I redeem my credits?
settings.faq_accordion_content: Log in and head to your Loyalty page to redeem your store credit for rewards. You can also use your points directly at checkout.

settings.faq_accordion_header: Where can I see my credits balance?
settings.faq_accordion_content: Log in to your account! Your credits balance will be highlighted at the top of the page.
Credits will expire after one year if there isn't any account activity.
Rewards will not expire once they are activated in the account.

settings.faq_accordion_header: What happens to my credits if I return a purchase?
settings.faq_accordion_content: If you return a purchase, the credits you earned for that purchase will be deducted from your account.

settings.faq_accordion_header: When do I get my birthday gift?
settings.faq_accordion_content: On your birthday! The only instance in which birthday credits will be delayed until next year is if your birthday is within 30 days from the day you entered it.

settings.faq_accordion_header: I forgot to use my credits at Checkout, can I apply them retroactively?
settings.faq_accordion_content: No, unfortunately credits cannot be redeemed on an order after the purchase has been completed.
